text: Through the Olive Trees ( Zīr-e Derakhtān-e Zeytūn, actually meaning Under the Olive Trees) is an 1994 Iranian drama movie directed by Abbas Kiarostami and starring Mohammad-Ali Keshavarz, Hossein Rezai. It was distributed by Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1994 drama movies Category:Iranian movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Abbas Kiarostami
title: Through the Olive Trees
